comment.author: 11013513@N07
comment._content: Are there any more vintage photos of the Philippines during the American colonial period (1898-1945)?

comment.author: 35122993@N08
comment._content: Hello Evangar21: Noticed your interest in more Philippines photos. You'll find other images relating to the Philippine Islands between the period 1890 and 1945 in the Prints & Photographs Division online catalog ("PPOC") (www.loc.gov/rr/print/catalog.html). Try searching the catalog using the following two keywords [without quotes]: "Philippines" "photographic prints". You should get over 400 results from different sources within your time frame.  (Of course, adding additional  keywords will narrow your search results to specific topics).  And, a broader search using only the keyword Philippines will get you even more pictures in a variety of formats in addition to photographs.
